description:

Truth is most certainly stranger than fiction, and reality,
as we know it, does not exist. We have been programmed
and indoctrinated to believe many lies, and this page
is my way of exposing the truth. Do your own research.
Question everything. If my posts resonate with you, I'm glad! Use them as stepping stones in your own journey. If you do not agree, please disregard and continue scrolling. 🐠 It is not my intention to try and convince you of anything. Take what you'd like, share what you want, or exit this post and do what's best for you.
.
. 
.
.
I no longer play word tennis with keyboard warriors.
